subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Despite being eight strokes off the lead, the two-time defending champion Padraig Harrington was focused on making up ground, saying that the deficit was “not insurmountable”.
snippet: Despite being eight strokes off the lead, the two-time defending champion Padraig Harrington was focused on making up ground, saying that the deficit was “not insurmountable”.
